pg13 1.0.0

Get Field Datatypes

Source: R/data_type_info.R
data_type_info.Rd

Get Field Datatypes

data_type_info(
  conn,
  conn_fun,
  table,
  sql_statement,
  verbose = TRUE,
  render_sql = TRUE,
  warn_no_rows = TRUE,
  render_only = FALSE,
  ...
)

Examples

library(pg13)
create_test_schema <-
        function(conn) {

                if (!schema_exists(conn = conn,
                                   schema = "test_schema")) {

                        cli::cli_rule("Create 'test_schema' Schema")

                        create_schema(conn = conn,
                                      schema = "test_schema")

                }
        }


conn <- local_connect(dbname = "pg13_test")

#> Connecting using PostgreSQL driver
create_test_schema(conn = conn)

#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> ── Create 'test_schema' Schema ─────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: CREATE SCHEMA test_schema;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...complete
write_table(conn = conn,
            schema = "test_schema",
            table_name = "test_table",
            drop_existing = TRUE,
            data = data.frame(A = 1:3, B = letters[1:3]))

#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_schema.test_table;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Dropping...
#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_schema.test_table;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...complete
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Dropping...complete
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: N/A
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Writing...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Writing...complete

data_type_info(conn = conn,
               table = "test_table")

#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: SELECT column_name as field, udt_name as data_type FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = 'test_table'
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Querying...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Querying...complete
#>   field data_type
#> 1     a      int4
#> 2     b   varchar



drop_table(conn = conn,
           schema = "test_schema",
           table = "test_table")

#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_schema.test_table;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Dropping...
#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: DROP TABLE IF EXISTS test_schema.test_table;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...complete
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Dropping...complete

drop_schema(conn = conn,
            schema = "test_schema",
            cascade = TRUE)

#> ── Checks ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
#> 			
#> ✓ Open connection
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	SQL: DROP SCHEMA IF EXISTS test_schema CASCADE;
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...
#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Sending...complete

dc(conn = conn)

#> [2020-12-20 16:27:13]	Postgres connection closed
